# unexpectedAudioFormat

**Type Property**

The audio input is in unexpected format.

## Declaration

```swift
static var unexpectedAudioFormat: SFSpeechError.Code { get }
```

## Audio format errors

- **incompatibleAudioFormats**: The selected modules do not have an audio format in common.
